verses.verse: Who is this that <S%H935>cometh<s%> from <S%H123>Edom<s%>, with <S%H2556>dyed<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> from <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%>? this that is <S%H1921>glorious<s%> in his <S%H3830>apparel<s%>, <S%H6808>marching<s%> in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H3581>strength<s%>? I that <S%H1696>speak<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, <S%H7227>mighty<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%>.
Wherefore art thou <S%H122>red<s%> in thine <S%H3830>apparel<s%>, and thy <S%H899>garments<s%> like him that <S%H1869>treadeth<s%> in the <S%H1660>winevat<s%>?

I have <S%H1869>trodden<s%> the <S%H6333>winepress<s%> <S%H5971>alone<s%>; and of the peoples there was <S%H376>no<s%> man with <S%H1869>me<s%>: yea, I trod them in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H7429>trampled<s%> them in my <S%H2534>wrath<s%>; and their <S%H5332>lifeblood<s%> is <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> upon my <S%H899>garments<s%>, and I have <S%H1351>stained<s%> all my <S%H4403>raiment<s%>.
For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> was in my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and the <S%H8141>year<s%> of my <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>.

And I <S%H5027>looked<s%>, and there was none to <S%H5826>help<s%>; and I <S%H8074>wondered<s%> that there was none to <S%H5564>uphold<s%>: therefore mine own <S%H2220>arm<s%> brought <S%H3467>salvation<s%> unto <S%H2534>me<s%>; and my wrath, it upheld <S%H5564>me<s%>.

And I trod <S%H947>down<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and made them <S%H7937>drunk<s%> in my <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, and I <S%H3381>poured<s%> out their <S%H5332>lifeblood<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, according to all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1580>bestowed<s%> on <S%H7227>us<s%>, and the great <S%H2898>goodness<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which he hath <S%H1580>bestowed<s%> on them according to his <S%H7356>mercies<s%>, and according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%>.
For he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5971>Surely<s%>, they are my people, <S%H1121>children<s%> that will not deal <S%H8266>falsely<s%>: so he was their <S%H3467>Saviour<s%>.

In all their <S%H6869>affliction<s%> he was <S%H6862>afflicted<s%>, and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of his <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H160>them<s%>: in his love and in his <S%H2551>pity<s%> he <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H5190>them<s%>; and he bare <S%H5375>them<s%>, and carried them all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>.

But they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%>, and <S%H6087>grieved<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>: therefore he was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to be their <S%H341>enemy<s%>, and himself fought against <S%H3898>them<s%>.

Then he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H5927>saying<s%>, Where is he that brought them up out of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of his <S%H6629>flock<s%>? where is he that <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>them<s%>?

that caused his <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> at the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>? that <S%H1234>divided<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>, to make himself an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>?
that <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>depths<s%>, as a <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, so that they stumbled <S%H3782>not<s%>?

As the <S%H929>cattle<s%> that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H1237>valley<s%>, the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> caused them to <S%H5117>rest<s%>; so didst thou <S%H5090>lead<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H6213>make<s%> thyself a <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>.

Look <S%H7200><s%> <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> from the <S%H2073>habitation<s%> of thy <S%H6944>holiness<s%> and of thy <S%H8597>glory<s%>: where are thy <S%H7068>zeal<s%> and thy <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1995>acts<s%>? the yearning of thy <S%H4578>heart<s%> and thy compassions are restrained toward <S%H662>me<s%>.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou art our <S%H1>Father<s%>, though <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3808>knoweth<s%> us <S%H3478>not<s%>, and Israel doth not <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> <S%H3068>us<s%>: thou, O Jehovah, art our <S%H1>Father<s%>; our <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> is thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, why dost thou make us to <S%H8582>err<s%> from thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H7188>hardenest<s%> our <S%H3820>heart<s%> from thy <S%H3374>fear<s%>? <S%H7725>Return<s%> for thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>' <S%H7626>sake<s%>, the tribes of thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it but a little <S%H4705>while<s%>: our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> have trodden <S%H947>down<s%> thy <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.
We are become as they over whom thou <S%H5769>never<s%> barest <S%H4910>rule<s%>, as they that were not <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
